item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:77 Chances: CNH Industrial NV is a well-established equipment and services company with a strong presence in the farming and construction industries. The company has a diversified operating segment, including Agriculture, Construction, and Financial Services, which provides stability and potential for growth. Recent recognition of CNH brands, Case IH and New Holland, as 2024 ASABE AE50 winners demonstrates the company’s commitment to innovation and excellence.
